text: @JoeBiden “...treating life-saving medical equipment as emoluments he can dole out as favors to loyalists... the worst imaginable form of corruption- playing political games w/ lives. For the good of this nation during what should be a time of unity, he must stop.” https://t.co/Q78B3ICT9u
